title: Desus & Mero
description:
Kevin meets the comedians behind the comedy team of Desus and Mero to find out about how they started out as a team all the way through their iconic interview with President Obama. 

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Desus Nice, Kevin Hart, The Kid Mero)
